programme.title: TIMBER!!
programme.desc: There is unusual rush at the tea shop as customers seem to be pouring in. Chai Raja efficiently whips up teas but they are running short of chairs. Sundar runs pillar to post to seat the customers, even though Basha is trying his best to trip him up. Sundar then has an unusual brainwave- sure that he will impress his boss, Sundar throws open the closet and pulls out some chairs that had been stacked in a while ago. Proudly he sets them up and looks over to Chai Raja for a pat on the back- but then termites march out from under the old chairs...up and down the shop, chewing the tables/chairs...Sundar runs to keep them from crashing but Basha is all for helping the termites out. He glibly channels them this way and that and Chai Raja gawks as his customers who sit on chairs end up squatting on sawdust. Chai Raja discovers that its Sundars brainwave thats responsible for this wave of pests! Its crunch time for the termites and Sundar...and he better hurry else Chai Raja will be left with handle-less pans and a pile of dust instead of furniture!

programme.title: CHAI-CE CREAM
programme.desc: It is a hot summer day and the customers are sweating. Chai Raja and Sundar are trying hard to keep them cool. To make matters worse a group of school students come with their class teacher as a part of their picnic. And the same time an ice-cream seller comes in front of the shop. Delighted, all the customers and the students flock around him to buy ice-cream. Chai Raja and Sundar are instantly out of customers and business. Totally frustrated, Chai Raja appoints Sundar to canvas the customers back to the hotel. Sundar tries to do some stupid performances to lure the kids back. But things take a twist when Basha teams up with the ice-cream seller. Now it is full on competition. And lets see who wins!

programme.title: COMPETITION!
programme.desc: A travelling carnival team puts up a show in front of Hotel Kelifornia. They are organizing a competition for the villagers. Climbing up the Greasy Pole. At the top is placed the trophy. Chai Raja is happy to have a crowd and good business. Sundar is happily serving tea outside when he suddenly sees the game. He is transfixed by it and wants to participate. Next we see a heated competition in which Basha, some kids, men, Sundar etc trying funnily to climb. At last it is Sundar and Basha who are left for the finals. Now they dont want each other to win. It is a maddening mayhem when Basha and Sundar play nasty tricks, traps and contraptions to make each others climb a disaster. Lets see who wins! Or will Chai Raja find out that his waiter is playing with the customers outside?! Oh my!

programme.title: Hopeless Dreams
programme.desc: Cat is taking a cat nap as Keet flies in and bangs a pan on Cats head and wakes him up. Cat gets up in a start and amazed by what he sees.

programme.title: LOCKED UP
programme.desc: After his Mutant Octopus is defeated, Negu decides to attack the Guardians himself with a Mutant Meerkat. The Guardians capture him, and the Elders have Negu locked up near the Magic Fort. The Mutant Meerkat tunnels into the fort so Negu can steal the Glove of the North – his plan all along. The Guardians rush to stop him, but Negu ties them up with his Lasso of Doom – until Pai gnaws through it and temporarily EATS the Glove of the North!

programme.title: Bobby's Day Out
programme.desc: The loose motion has caught on to Cat, when he agrees to babysit his neighboring cat Katreena’s neice for the afternoon.

programme.title: Prince Gummy
programme.desc: Gummy discovers that he may be next in line to the throne of a tiny faraway country – and he takes a crash-course in ‘how to be royal’... with ‘crash’ being the key word!

programme.title: BE QUIET!
programme.desc: The Guardians travel to Anjing Island to retrieve Maestro Meow’s drum from the island’s ogre, who HATES noise of any kind. But the ogre steals Pai’s voice! Will he get it back in time to sing at tonight’s Good Luck Concert?

programme.title: A Sweet Rush
programme.desc: What began as a tug of war for a six layered cake culminated in Don fixing a security alarm to the kitchen door that stopped anyone from stepping in, even Don himself. Lary Marly and Charly have found a way to dance themselves to the fridge escaping the floor sensors.

programme.title: NewPointofView
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: The Feast
programme.desc: GrandPA has some special guests visiting him. GrandPA tells Dunky in the morning to have a very tasty and mouth watering fish curry prepared for them.

programme.title: To Catch a Thief
programme.desc: A notorious robber has come to rob GrandPA’s house. He has with him a fancy paint and brush which can makes him blend seamlessly into anything.

programme.title: A CLEAN BREAK
programme.desc: The Guardians want a maid to clean up their mess. The Elders object, but a maid answers Pai’s ad – a ROBOT maid, that is, who turns out to be Negu’s latest minion! Will the Guardians be able to convince the robot to give them back their magical accessories so they can defeat Negu’s henchmen?

programme.title: CAN I KEEP HER PLEASE?
programme.desc: Buzz finds a strange seed and tenderly nurtures it. The seed sprouts and blossoms into a healthy, baby plant he names Ruby. As Ruby grows, she eats more and more healthy food and becomes very large and aggressive towards the other Creepy Candy TM. Ty-Poe suggests that Ruby be moved to a different environment out in nature. Will Buzz let her go, will she go peacefully, will the other Creepy CandyTM be eaten? Watch the funny and action packed episode to find out what happens.

programme.title: Yogi Don
programme.desc: One fine day a courier comes for Don – a yoga training guide. Now Don is all yogic and spiritual. Phew!! The trio just can’t take all this. And when they get into action, Don sees all seven heavens from the yoga mat itself.

programme.title: MILKY MESS
programme.desc: Business is brisk and Chai Raja frets as the milkman has not arrived and he is almost all out of milk. Sundar gets a so called brain-wave and lures in a genial cow from the not distant yard to help restore supply. Chai Raja is favourably impressed but then equally depressed when following the cow, enters a pugnacious bull not all happy with Sundar for wooing away his girlfriend. Its manic mayhem as the bull chases Sundar around the tea-shop, lent a generous helping hand by Basha who seems to know every trick in the book to drive the bull berserk and Sundar barking mad.

programme.title: NOW YOU TEA ME
programme.desc: Basha sits plotting his next move to divest the snack shelf off more kachoris when he is surprised to find his banana mocktail being drained by someone invisible. Basha soon finds out its a chameleon with a super camouflage- and the best part? If Basha too touches it, for a short while, he too can camouflage to merge with the immediate surrounding! Basha rushes to use the chameleon as to grab the kachoris. Sundar is indeed stumped for a while as he sees the kachoris magically disappear and pranks magically make him stumble and mess up the order. But then he hears Bashas chuckle and staying hidden, finds out Bashas secret. Sundar immediately tricks the chameleon out of Bashas hands and voila! Now Sundar is camouflaging. Gleefully, Sundar just starts exacting revenge when to his horror, he finds that the chameleon is an even bigger thief than Basha who is guzzling the tea as well as snacks set for the customers. Chai Raja who catches a glimpse of Sundar camouflaging after touching the chameleon and then watches the snacks and tea disappearing immediately suspects him. Sundar must now clear his image quick else he will be cleared out of Hotel California once and for all.

programme.title: DAMSEL DISTRESS
programme.desc: Sundar is dusting the shop in the morning just before service when out of a wallet falls an old photo of a pretty girl. Grinning, Sundar shoves it in front of Chai Raja. Chai Raja taken aback at the photo sighs and looks lovelorn for a second- then shoves the wallet and photo out of sight. Sundar is distracted by another of naughty Bashas antics and doesnt think much of it until there is a swish of unusual colour at the door entrance. And there she stands! Chai Rajas old army crush! Chai Raja is at first stunned but surprise turns to shock when she holds out an invitation- for her newly opening snack shop, right next door. Chai Raja starts sweating and Sundar understands the cause for her consternation soon enough when the next day Chaha Devi (what she calls herself) opens her stand. Its a runaway hit! She is a Bharatnatyam dancer and cooks a meaner batch of fries than Chai Raja dancing bharatnatyam while she cooks so good that not only Chai Rajas clientele is wooed away, but so is Basha! There starts a hilarious and amusing dance off between Chai Raja and Chaha Devi. Chai raja is torn between anger and admiration and its all left to Sundar to salvage Hotel Californias future..and for that may need Bashas help!

programme.title: GUILLI DANDA
programme.desc: It is a busy day in Hotel Kelifornia and Sundar is busy serving the customer; when a guilli comes and fall on his plate destroying everything. Sundar comes out to see a totally oblivious and excited Basha playing guilli danda with a few kids. Sundar has a mean idea and he innocently joins them in the game. It is his turn to hit the guilli and he intentionally hit is towards Basha who innocently takes it in the spirit. The kids laugh. Sundar does this the second time also. This time the kids laugh and Sundar laughs falling on to the ground. And Sundar runs to the shop with a cheeky laugh like a victor. Basha wants to give it back to Sundar big times. And he decides to play rough. The hotel then faces crazy hits of guillis on food plates, on customers, on Chai Rajas kettle and on Sundars butt. And whenever Chai Raja turns around to see what is going on, Basha makes sure that the guilli ends up in Sundars mouth. The charade gets so crazy that in the end the guilli comes and hits hard on Chai Rajas head. An angry Chai Raja turns around and Sundar quickly pulls Chai Raja to the door to show Basha and gang playing. Basha and the kids freeze seeing Chai Raja with a huge bump on his head holding the guilli. Sundar is excitedly waiting. The next moment Chai Raja takes out his belan and hits the guilli with a smile and joins the team in the game. It is game time and Sundar faints in shock

programme.title: Panda-Monium
programme.desc: Maestro Woof needs the kind of bamboo that the Purple Panda eats so he can make a new flute, and he sends the Guardians to find some. Xia criticizes April’s skills as a pilot, so she decides to take the Lord of the Wind on a practice run while her friends look for the bamboo. When Xia and Pai are captured by a Mutant Purple Panda, April gets to show off her piloting prowess as she rescues them, and at the same time gathers the bamboo they need.

programme.title: SuperCat
programme.desc: Cat watches his favorite super hero “SuperCat” on tv and is inspired to be like him in every way even fly like him.

programme.title: Tarantula Twist
programme.desc: A wealthy eccentric bureaucrat from South America is saunters into the tea shop one day. Chai Raja is eager to please the bureaucrat and cordons off a VIP section for him- however such demarcations are of no consequence when Basha and Sundar are locked in a manic chase. The naughty Basha manoeuvres Sundar into crashing past the barricade and upsetting the careful setup. The blustering bureaucrat is all set to throw a fit when suddenly he sees something and shrieks in childlike delight. Its a massive spider that often lurks about the tea-shop. Fishing out a delicate collectors glass case with exotic arachnids, the foreigner eagerly points at the one missing species that he has not yet managed to bag. He wants the spider Pronto! Chai Raja orders Sundar to nab said arachnid but Sundar is frankly freaked out. He gingerly sets about his task as the bureaucrat taps manicured fingers in impatience but finds its not going to be easy as Basha just to spite Sundar has decided to team up with the Tarantula and preserve the latters freedom. The tarantula in its turn, is no pushover and proves deft and spinning inventive webs that not only trap people but bounce them off or string them up etc. The many booby traps Sundar lays all backfire and finally end in bureaucrats glass case rupturing and the collected chasing the collector. While Sundar gets his spatula dues from Chai Raja. Basha and the Tarantula hi-five- one against seven

programme.title: BirthDay Party
programme.desc: Its GrandPAs birthday and Keet and Cat are given the task of decorating the house while Dunky is planning to make a nice cake for the evening party.

programme.title: Jack and the Beanstalk
programme.desc: A kind boy GoGo finds a bean seed and grows it, which sprouts all the way into the clouds. GoGo climbs the plant and finds the Giants castle above the clouds.

programme.title: Heir To Stay
programme.desc: Sundar cleaning out the front of the shop is surprised to find a cheeky-faced snot-digging kid glaring at him bossily. Turns out its Chai Rajas one and only nephew whom the man dotes on but is in fact pest incarnate as far as Sundar is concerned. Pakru, the boy acts as if he owns the shop and finds inventive ways of harassing Sundar. Basha is amused and happily tries to help himself to some freebies while Sundar is kept occupied. But then, Basha receives a rude shock when Pakru extends his nastiness towards Basha as well! There is chaos in the shop as Pakru, being sly manages to out-think even the normally nifty Basha. Its complete chaos and the seething Basha decides to team up with Sundar and teach the bully Pakru a thing or two about defending ones territory. Pakru sensing this believes he has outprank them, but Basha and Sundar use the ace up their sleeve- their knowledge of Chai Rajas habits. With each passing minute, Chai Raja finds his favourite kettle smashed, his fritters burnt, his clocks spring sprung, his favourite spatula missing and each time Pakru is implicated! Finally losing his cool, Chai Raja boots Pakru out and Sundar gleefully turns to hi-five Basha- but the naughty monkey is already raiding the snack-shelf again! With an angry snarl, Sundar chases at Basha as the chai chai tune plays in the background.

programme.title: Moles' Wedding
programme.desc: The Mole couple want their daughter to have the above-ground life with sunlight unlike themselves. Therefore, the couple go on a journey to find the husband who will have a joyful life with their daughter above the ground.

programme.title: GIVEAWAY
programme.desc: The Elders assign lots of chores to the Guardians. To get them to mellow out, Pai prepares a special dish. They become so mellow they start giving away all their possessions. Seeing an opportunity, Negu sends his henchmen to ask for the Glove of the North. Koto and Amkko fail, so Negu sends Mei and the Mutant Raccoon in disguise. The Mutant Raccoon ends up smashing himself in the face with the nunchucks given to Pai by the Elders.

programme.title: April’s Rain
programme.desc: The Wise Elders ask the Guardians to tidy up their island. Negu seizes the chance to send his Dust Mutant to make the island even dirtier. Pai and Xia ask April to make it rain and clean everything effortlessly. But April hasn’t yet mastered this power, and accidentally creates a tornado. Fortunately it defeats the Dust Monster… but unfortunately, it leaves a total mess, and they still have to tidy up.

programme.title: A Star Is Jumped
programme.desc: Odessa learns to leap over stars by starting on low ones,Persistence pays off, especially when you learn from each step along the way, building up to the final goal.

programme.title: STICKY SITUATION
programme.desc: Having used his Mystic Stick to defeat a giant beaver, Pai loves his weapon more than ever. Spying, Negu gets an idea. The Guardians’ and the Elders’ possessions start to go missing, and they keep being tricked. A mysterious expert declares the culprit to be…Pai’s stick! But just as Xia’s about to burn the stick, it turns into a mutant Stick Insect sent by Negu! The Guardians battle the mutant and defeat it using Pai’s beloved stick.

programme.title: “How To Ride A Bike”
programme.desc: Colonel has gifted Don a brand new bike. But Don cant ride even to save his life! Colonel trains him but in vain! He bumps into other cars, stalls, crops until he finally bumps into Ballu!

programme.title: Beach Boys
programme.desc: The sun shining bright up in the sky, what a perfect day to laze around on the beach! But the beach boys are in for some mean surprises! Stolen picnic baskets, flying sandwiches, mixed up sun tan lotions and shark attacks.

programme.title: The Low Price of Fame
programme.desc: Team Racing is introduced. Speed, X and Annalise are on one team. When Analise is made team captain they must get over their differences for the good of the team. Before the race Annalise is contacted by the Shadowy woman who tells her that a saboteur will enter the race and attack the Mach 6. She orders Annalise to aid the saboteur. It seems like Annalise might but at the last moment takes the hit and saves Speed and the Mach 6. While investigating where the saboteur came from, Speed and the gang discover a tear in the virtual track. The saboteurs got in through the tear, which leaves the school vulnerable to attack. Conor patches the tear but they have to find the source. Since the virtual track is temporarily closed the Racer Academy is invited to race at the Alpha Academy. Tipped off by Speed Sr., Speed and Conor investigate and find the source of the virtual tear. They chalk it up to competitive sabotoge, but we find out that the Alpha Academy is connected to the Shadowy Organization.

programme.title: The Bigger The Lie
programme.desc: ODESSA thinks she’s gotten away with a little white lie until she visits the Zooniverse where she meets the FIBASAURUS – a tiny, fantastical creature that grows bigger and bigger with every fib that Odessa tells until it is a towering monster capable of upending the Zooniverse!. Little white lies can only grow larger and larger.

programme.title: Doobydoo Meep Concert
programme.desc: The annual Doobydoo Meep concert is about to take place, and Charlie wants to practice one last time before heading out. So Deedee chips in by agreeing to follow specific instructions to organise the difficult to manage Doobydoos but also promises not to use magic for anything at all. Deedee mixes up the sandwiches for the Doodyboos with the recorders that she ends up sending off with Mewmew. Nino constantly keeps Deedee in check so that she doesn’t back out of her promise. Mewmew is having a tough time organising with the Doobydoos while Deedee finds out Charlie has slept of practising. The concert goes well, but they all decide they won’t have lullabies ever again.

programme.title: You Can Leave Your Hat Off
programme.desc: When Odessa doesnt want to get rid of her old coat, now to small, because shes had it forever (and is a little afraid of change), but when she ends up helping Ene find a hat, she learns that change isnt something to be afraid, but something to be embraced. Change can be good

programme.title: "Water, Water Every Where"
programme.desc: GrandPA takes the trio for a small ride to the nearby towns newly opened mini waterpark. Cat is all excited and is wearing water goggles and a snorkeling gear.

programme.title: Like A Bridge Over Troubled Teeter Totters
programme.desc: Pancake helps the Zoonicorns “imagine” a bridge across the Sticky-Icky River, but it comes out completely wrong, and he must learn not to give up and that just because something ended up a bit different than planned that it still can’t do the job. Don’t give up if something doesn’t go exactly as planned; keep trying and be creative.

programme.title: Flash Blind
programme.desc: Don rips apart the parcel and out comes A Brand New Camera! Don is on a clicking spree. He makes colonel pose and ends up clicking Ballu. From friends to enemies to the innards of his tummy, he captures it all.

programme.title: Clumsysaurus
programme.desc: The twins help a Dinosaur cope with his clumsiness by attaching wing-mirrors to his flanks so that he can check on his trailing tail.

programme.title: Maroon
programme.desc: When Kala tells Gummy and Harry that her favourite color is maroon, the pair decide to give her an ‘all maroon’ birthday surprise – but they soon learn that there can sometimes be ‘too much of a good thing’.

programme.title: Just A Day’s Work
programme.desc: It is just a usual day in Don’s life and everything goes on as usual. The rat trio is at their nasty best. And Don and Colonel are at their wit’s end. With the entire house going wild, it seems our guys can’t imagine a single day without each other.

programme.title: Dimsum To Go
programme.desc: A bowl of lip smacking Dimsums and four pair of eyes. Don tries his best to hide it but in vain! Watch Don and the mice chase each other in this quest.

programme.title: Little big lizard
programme.desc: The twins help a tiny lizard who everyone was ignoring, find a princesss ring and save the day.

programme.title: A Fright Night
programme.desc: It is late night movie day and Don and Colonel are watching Dracula. Don is shell scared and the rat trio has a superb idea. Now with Charly, Marly and Larry trying all sorts of pranks, it is utter fright night for Don and Colonel. But even the rats come to fear Dracula… How???

programme.title: Iris Gone Wild
programme.desc: When Maple is jealous of everything Pancake gets to do because hes older, she sees a chance to be the oldest in the Zooniverse and grabs it. But being oldest isnt as simple as she thinks it will be. Understanding that you have different abilities and responsibilities at every age./Respecting your limits

programme.title: Much to Your Surprise
programme.desc: When Maple ruins a surprise meant for Pancake, she finds out in the Zooniverse that surprises are only surprising when they are surprises. Seeing things from other people’s points of view can make things easier to understand.

programme.title: Hopeless Dreams
programme.desc: Cat is taking a cat nap as Keet flies in and bangs a pan on Cats head and wakes him up. Cat gets up in a start and amazed by what he sees.

programme.title: BirthDay Party
programme.desc: Its GrandPAs birthday and Keet and Cat are given the task of decorating the house while Dunky is planning to make a nice cake for the evening party.

programme.title: SPACE INVADER
programme.desc: Krackleflint is back with the latest and greatest diabolical offering from Krackleflint Industries Inc.

programme.title: Cinema Night
programme.desc: Blockbusters have released and Don and Colonel are in the theatre to get tickets. But the naughty rats pick their pocket and buy tickets. Now the dogs are penniless and would go to any extend to get into the theatre. But when the trio enters the picture, the poor dogs suffer like anything. But, Larry Marly and Charly will end up in deep mess. Wait and watch!

programme.title: Invincible Dragon - Saitn George’s Legend
programme.desc: SANDRA visits her UNCLE TONY at the old funfair where he works and is shocked to hear that it is about to shut down, because of falling visitor numbers. When she is on the ghost train, she is visited by her assistant FO, who has come to get her for a new case in the “Land of Fairytales”. On this occasion, SANDRA and FO travel into the legend of “Saint George and the Dragon”, where they face a very singular DRAGON.

programme.title: Harold's Missing Spoon
programme.desc: On a gusty day, Pancake has lost his favorite hat, and he’s looked EVERYWHERE, finally giving up and thinking maybe someone snatched it – Maple. The younger otter denies it (despite a history of “borrowing” stuff from Pancake and not putting any of it back), but Pancake doesn’t believe her. He goes to sleep thinking his little sister has his hat.When he arrives in the Zooniverse, he finds the Zoonicorns are in the midst of a Harold Crisis: the bear has lost one of his prized spoons!

programme.title: Smile Like An Angel
programme.desc: Duda y sus amigos deciden hacer pareja para ir a una expedición. Scot sugiere hacer una votación y el amigo que no sea elegido tiene que ser socio de un espantapájaros. Desafortunadamente para Scot, termina con el espantapájaros. De vuelta a casa, Scot se pregunta por qué es tan impopular. Con un poco de ayuda de Piggy and Puggy y su invento el Smile Ha-ha, Scot se transforma en un "ángel sonriente" y hace que los hermanos búho anuncien a todo el mundo su nueva y mejorada personalidad. Duda corre a Scot para verlo por sí mismo, y termina causando estragos en el escondite de Scot. Scot casi explota de rabia y le ordena a Duda que se vaya. Sorprendentemente, Duda le dice a todo el mundo lo agradable y divertido que era Scot y todos aparecen en la puerta de Scot. ¿Conseguirá Scot finalmente un compañero para la próxima expedición?

programme.title: Monkey Business
programme.desc: Don’s food supplies are getting stolen and he blames the rats. Now it seems there is a new thief around. And it is a monkey from the courtyard tree. And the monkey is definitely smarter and messier than the dogs and the rats put together. But, at last when they are about to catch the monkey, the storey takes an unexpected turn…….

programme.title: Squirrel Scare
programme.desc: Fred can’t believe that Brains is afraid of anything, let alone little tiny squirrels. Every year their town is overrun with hundreds of migrating squirrels! Together they struggle to rid the town of squirrels.

programme.title: BE QUIET!
programme.desc: The Guardians travel to Anjing Island to retrieve Maestro Meow’s drum from the island’s ogre, who HATES noise of any kind. But the ogre steals Pai’s voice! Will he get it back in time to sing at tonight’s Good Luck Concert?

programme.title: You Can Leave Your Hat Off
programme.desc: When Odessa doesnt want to get rid of her old coat, now to small, because shes had it forever (and is a little afraid of change), but when she ends up helping Ene find a hat, she learns that change isnt something to be afraid, but something to be embraced. Change can be good

programme.title: Car Trouble
programme.desc: Colonel buys a brand new car and brings it to show off to his bro Don. But Larry Marly and Charly would just not let it happen. The dog bros put their lives in danger to save the shiny four wheeler. But alas! All that is left of the car is its crumpled skeleton. Thank God the rats spared their lives!

programme.title: THE PAI WHO CRIED WOLF
programme.desc: To discover his powers as the Rodent Warrior, Pai goes on a solo night quest. But he keeps seeing the Wolf Warrior (Koto and Amkko in a disguise made by Mei). He runs to tell April and Xia, who don’t believe him. He battles the Wolf Warrior, discovering his Rodent Warrior powers (Super-Burrowing and Super-Cheeks) as he reveals Koto and Amkko inside the disguise.

programme.title: LOVE IS BLIND
programme.desc: Fulfilling the Elders’ assignment to wrangle clouds, Pai falls in love with a rodent girl named Lol. But Lol proves to be one of Negu’s mutants, intent on stealing the Glove of the North.

programme.title: Trekker's Delight
programme.desc: GrandPA is visiting his distant cousin in a remote area .the next day Dunky has woken up early and takes the sleepy parrot Keet and Cat for a morning trek to the mountains.

programme.title: “How To Ride A Bike”
programme.desc: Colonel has gifted Don a brand new bike. But Don cant ride even to save his life! Colonel trains him but in vain! He bumps into other cars, stalls, crops until he finally bumps into Ballu!

programme.title: Double Trouble
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Road Trip Snag
programme.desc: Don and Colonel is on a journey in their house on wheels. But hey! With the rats around, will they ever have a peaceful anything??? It is indeed a fun for the trio, but not for poor Don and Colonel. The house on wheels turns into a madhouse on wheels!

programme.title: Crushing Friday
programme.desc: Fred impresses his pals when he enters their favorite Robot Battle TV show (using Friday as his robot of course). When Friday demolishes the fan favorite however, instead of cheering Fred, they mourn “Speedy” the crushed bot. Brains rebuilds Speedy and her own girl robot, “Little Miss Missile Hands.”

programme.title: GAME OVER
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to climb a mountain and ring a bell. Seeing his henchmen distracted by an old videogame, Negu sends the game up to the Yan World to distract the Guardians. Xia and Pai become obsessed with the game, stealing it back and forth from each other.

programme.title: Duda Buddy
programme.desc: Duda thinks the Scottie Buddy is pretty awesome and asks Scot if he could go for a ride. Scot flatly refuses, so Duda is determined to make a Scottie Buddy of his own. Realizing that it is difficult to make one, Duda returns to Scot hoping for some help. Scot agrees to help Duda if he becomes his assistant. But Duda ends up causing more chaos instead of being helpful. Scot sends him off with a box of old parts and tells him to make his own Duda Buddy. Surprisingly, Duda manages to build a decent replica. Meanwhile, Scot discovers that his new wheel is not suitable for Scottie Buddy and wants him to return his old wheel to Duda...

programme.title: Space Ride
programme.desc: Don and Colonel stare at the moon maps and rockets. And along with Charly Marly and Lary, their rocket leaps out from earth and into outerspace. Meteors flash past and they land on a new planet, will they ever make it back to earth again???

programme.title: Me-tal Magnet
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Fly Away Nino
programme.desc: Nino and Mewmew are making paper planes, but as Mewmew didn’t follow all the instructions Nino’s flies so well and much farther. And not just Nino, the twins too have fun seeing their planes fly so well. But no matter how much Mewmew tries it doesn’t fly like the planes of the others. Mewmew wishes her planes flew too so she asks Deedee to work some magic for her. So Deedee casts an ‘all day flying’ spell onto Mewmew’s plane but Nino comes in-between and gets hit by the spell on his helmet. Now Nino can’t stop flying and zooms away all over Abra-Dabra. He flies so wildly that he send Mayor De Pfeffle for a spin after knocking over his flower display. Nino is sorry for being so carried away that he tries to land, but to his surprise the helmet keeps pulling him skyward. Charlie tries weighing Nino down with his heavy mail bag, but the helmet is too strong for even Charlie to grab a hold of that Nino is flung away higher and farther. Nino promises to deliver the mail, much to the happiness of Charlie who can get a much deserved nap for all the effort. So begins Abra-Dabra’s very own first ‘air’-mail courtesy of Nino. Deedee comes up with a plan to help the ‘jet-lagged’ Nino after being inspired by the paper planes Mewmew makes. She shouts out to Nino to use a long sheet of paper from the mail bag and make a plane ‘Mewmew style’ with the wings pointing downwards. The plan works and Nino is able to fly right into Mewmew’s house and the magic wears-off as the sun sets in Abra-Dabra. In all the fuss Mewmew understands what made her planes not to fly, which actually helped Nino come down, and makes her paper planes fly so well now, thanks to Deedee.

programme.title: The Bigger The Lie
programme.desc: ODESSA thinks she’s gotten away with a little white lie until she visits the Zooniverse where she meets the FIBASAURUS – a tiny, fantastical creature that grows bigger and bigger with every fib that Odessa tells until it is a towering monster capable of upending the Zooniverse!. Little white lies can only grow larger and larger.

programme.title: Too Cute
programme.desc: Biggs transforms himself into a cute baby animal to blend into Leilas Zoo. Now disguised, he can easily help Sneevil steal the Earth Stone. But all the sweet attention from Leila makes Biggs question his loyalty.

programme.title: El secuestro
programme.desc: Alexandra reconoce en un reportaje a su hijo desaparecido, pero nadie le cree y ella comienza a investigar.

programme.title: El secuestro
programme.desc: Alexandra reconoce en un reportaje a su hijo desaparecido, pero nadie le cree y ella comienza a investigar.

programme.title: El secuestro

programme.desc: Investigative reporter Joshua Philipp examines the deeper meaning behind the day's news.

programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.desc: Be at the forefront of top stories, breaking news, current affairs and all there is to know in the Arab region and around the world.

programme.desc: A talk show tackling major news topics Al Arabiya-style.

programme.title: Sports News
programme.desc: Satisfying the needs of sports enthusiasts, Al Arabiya features specialized sports programs which aim to provide in-depth news and analysis on regional and international events.

programme.title: Haha W Tofaha
programme.desc: Director: Akram Farid - Cast: Yasmin Abd El Aziz / Talat Zakaria - Year of production: 2006

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: Soul Detective
programme.desc: "An officer from the underworld joins forces with a policeman to track down evil spirits that have escaped to the mortal realm. Together, they explore the good and evil of human nature. This drama combines traditional and modern elements to bring a new fantasy experience to the audience. "

programme.title: Its In Our Nature
programme.desc: A million wildlife species are facing the threat of extinction. But why does this matter to a tiny city state like Singapore? What do we stand to lose if our wildlife go extinct? Host Lam Shushan comes face to face with some of the rarest creatures in the world and meets the tenacious frontliners who are racing to save our native wildlife from extinction.

programme.title: Its In Our Nature

Host Lam Shushan comes face to face with some of the rarest creatures in the world and meets the tenacious frontliners who are racing to save our native wildlife from extinction.

programme.title: Incredible Tales Sr 7
programme.desc: Hosted by Utt, Incredible Tales returns for Season 7, featuring more ghoulish stories of paranormal encounters from Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand and Philippines. Incredible Tales is all about ghost stories told through generations, crossing boundaries of culture and language. Stories that generate intrigue, fascination, and fear.

programme.title: Incredible Tales Sr 7

Incredible Tales is all about ghost stories told through generations, crossing boundaries of culture and language. Stories that generate intrigue, fascination, and fear.

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Crave
programme.desc: Warning: do not watch Crave on an empty stomach. Because we’ll have you craving a creamy scoop of ice cream bedded on a crispy waffle. Or really, really needing to crunch into juicy fried chicken right now. Hosted by Charlotte Mei, the runner-up of Eat List Star, Crave finds out what gets celebrities salivating – roti prata, roast meats, sushi, satay, salted egg ice cream, buah keluak, and even an English-style big breakfast! Our celebrities’ cravings know no bounds, and anything from local to Japanese to Mediterranean fare is fair game – as long as they crave it. And there’s a little special by Charlotte. On every show, she will cook a dish – guaranteed to make you crave for it!

programme.title: Its In Our Nature
programme.desc: A million wildlife species are facing the threat of extinction. But why does this matter to a tiny city state like Singapore? What do we stand to lose if our wildlife go extinct? Host Lam Shushan comes face to face with some of the rarest creatures in the world and meets the tenacious frontliners who are racing to save our native wildlife from extinction.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: The Crystal Brawl 1957
programme.desc: Bluto muscles out Popeye to take Olive to the fair. Popeye rushes ahead and poses as a fortune teller, luring Olive in. He shows Olive her future (actually, her past) in the crystal ball: first, a clip of a mountain climbing sequence that culminates in Bluto assaulting Olive. Then, a clip from another amusement park showing strongman Bluto stealing Olive away to a roller-coaster while Popeye rings a strength-testing bell repeatedly. Olive, having seen this, no longer wants anything to do with Bluto and walks out. Bluto exposes Popeye and chases Olive into a Tunnel of Love; Popeye follows and trashes Bluto.

programme.title: Betty Boop- More Pep- 1936
programme.desc: In a return to the 'Out of the Inkwell' format, Betty Boop invents a 'pep' formula to speed up lazy Pudgy, but it escapes into the 'real world' with rapid results.

programme.title: A Date to Skate 1938
programme.desc: Popeye takes Olive roller skating in a rink; she's never skated before, so he has to teach her, and she's not exactly a quick learner. After a while, she ends up outside the rink, and still out of control; she skates through a department store and causes major traffic problems. When she gets stuck on a speeding fire truck, Popeye realizes he'll need his spinach, but he's out fortunately, an audience member tosses him a can.

programme.title: Betty Boop and the Little King 1936
programme.desc: The Little King, comic strip character, meets Betty Boop.

programme.title: Superman: Destruction Inc.-1942
programme.desc: Superman versus saboteurs at the Metropolis Munitions Plant

programme.title: My Favorite Duck 1942
programme.desc: Porky tries to relax on a hunting and fishing trip, but Daffy, smugly pointing out the "No Duck Hunting" signs, subjects him to constant irritation. Then the "Duck Hunting Season Open" signs start going up.

programme.title: The Henpecked Rooster 1944
programme.desc: A henpecked rooster and a streetwise mouse team up to thwart the fowl's foul wife.

programme.title: Superman cartoons 6
programme.desc: Superman cartoons 6

programme.title: Betty Boop- The Scared Crows 1939
programme.desc: Betty Boop and Pudgy, doing the spring planting, are plagued by crows.

programme.title: Play Safe -1936
programme.desc: A little boy jumps on a real train and learns a lesson about safety.

programme.title: Patriotic Popeye (1080)
programme.desc: Popeye is enjoying watering his patriotic garden on July 4 when he catches his nephews attempting to light fireworks. The game is on when he attempts to confiscate the fireworks and the boys strike back with edgy pranks. Bluto and Olive Oyl do not appear in this cartoon.

programme.title: Ride Him, Bosko -1931
programme.desc: BosKo in the Wild West, tries to have fun with any situation that come in his way.

programme.title: The Front Page 1931
programme.desc: A crusading newspaper editor tricks his retiring star reporter into covering one last case.

programme.title: The 'High Sign'-1921
programme.desc: A drifter at an amusement park finds himself both the bodyguard and hit man of a man targeted by a criminal gang.

programme.title: His Musical Career-1914
programme.desc: Charlie and his partner are to deliver a piano to 666 Prospect St. and repossess one from 999 Prospect St. They confuse the addresses. The difficulties of delivering the piano by mule cart, and most of the specific gags, appeared later in Laurel and Hardy's "The Music Box".

programme.title: The Rink by Charlie Chaplin 1916
programme.desc: After causing restaurant chaos at work, a bumbling waiter tears up the local roller rink with his skating.

programme.title: Hop to It, Bellhop 1919
programme.desc: Two hotel bell hops get into all kinds of shenanigans between dames, baths and bags of loot.

programme.title: The Immigrant 1917
programme.desc: Charlie is an immigrant who endures a challenging voyage and gets into trouble as soon as he arrives in America

programme.title: Bear Shooters 1930
programme.desc: While on a camping trip, the gang comes across poachers.

programme.title: Dough and Dynamite-1914
programme.desc: Charlie and another waiter must become bakers when the regular bakers go out on strike. The strikers put dynamite in a piece of bread which is delivered to the cake counter. It winds up in the oven and explodes.

programme.title: The Dick Van Dyke Show 1962: Season 2; Episode 4; Bank Book 6565696
programme.desc: Rob discovers Laura's secret bank account. Its mystery preoccupies his thoughts till he finally has to confront her and ask what it's for.

programme.title: Santa Claus 1959
programme.desc: In Santa Claus, the holiday takes a surreal and magical turn in this colorful fantasy from Mexico. As Christmas Eve approaches, Santa battles the schemes of a mischievous demon sent by the Devil to ruin the season for children everywhere. With the help of Merlin the wizard, a loyal band of helpers, and his magical workshop in the sky, Santa must outwit evil and deliver joy to the world. Whimsical, strange, and utterly unique, this cult holiday classic blends wonder, morality, and a touch of the bizarre into a Christmas tale like no other.

programme.title: Herod the Great 1959
programme.desc: In Herod the Great, the turbulent life of one of history’s most infamous rulers unfolds in epic fashion. After securing his throne through ambition and bloodshed, King Herod struggles to hold power over Judea amid political intrigue, betrayal, and the looming rise of a new faith. Caught between ruthless authority and his own inner torment, Herod’s reign is marked by both grandeur and tragedy. With sweeping battles, palace drama, and a powerful portrayal of a king consumed by fear, this historical epic brings to life the dark legacy of a ruler whose name echoes through the ages.

programme.title: Esther and the King 1960
programme.desc: In Esther and the King, the timeless biblical story unfolds in a lavish tale of courage, love, and destiny. When King Ahasuerus of Persia (Richard Egan) seeks a new queen, the beautiful and humble Esther (Joan Collins) is chosen, unaware that her faith will soon be tested. As a deadly plot threatens her people, Esther must summon her strength to risk everything and protect them. With grandeur, passion, and epic spectacle, this historical drama brings to life one of the Bible’s most inspiring heroines.

programme.title: Prisoner In The Middle
programme.desc: Palestinian guerrillas, Israeli commandos and an American colonel fight to keep a nuclear warhead mistakenly dropped in the Jordanian desert by a U.S. Air Force nuclear bomber.

programme.title: Alien Contamination
programme.desc: A former astronaut helps a government agent and a police detective track the source of mysterious alien pod spores, filled with lethal flesh-dissolving acid, to a South American coffee plantation controlled by alien pod clones.

programme.title: A Bucket Of Blood
programme.desc: A dimwitted busboy at a beatnik cafe passes off a cat he accidentally killed and covered in plaster as a sculpture, prompting a demand for more art that compels him to commit murders.

programme.title: The Bushwhackers 1952
programme.desc: In The Bushwhackers, John Ireland stars as a war-weary Confederate soldier who drifts west seeking peace, only to find violence waiting on the frontier. When ruthless land barons use guns and terror to drive settlers from their homes, he’s forced to take up arms once more. With Lon Chaney Jr. and Lawrence Tierney adding menace and intrigue, this tense Western delivers a hard-hitting tale of greed, justice, and a reluctant hero who can’t outrun the fight for what’s right.

programme.title: Mclintock! 1963
programme.desc: John Wayne leads the charge in McLintock!, a rip-roaring Western comedy brimming with action, romance, and frontier spirit. As wealthy cattle baron George Washington McLintock tries to keep the peace between feuding homesteaders, rowdy cowhands, and local Native tribes, he also faces his toughest battle yet—his fiery estranged wife (Maureen O’Hara), who’s just returned to town. Filled with slapstick brawls, lively banter, and heartwarming humor, McLintock! delivers classic Western entertainment with larger-than-life charm.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, host Bryan Baiss takes a closer look at the Rocky Patel White Label cigar. Join Bryan as he reviews its smooth, balanced flavors, even burn, and overall performance, sharing his thoughts on what makes this cigar a top contender in its category.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: Brian and Chris, the discerning palates behind Burn Rate, turn their attention to the Grandeur Cremo cigar. They'll meticulously analyze its blend, construction, and smoking characteristics, offering their experienced insights into this intriguing offering. Tune in to discover if the Grandeur Cremo delivers on its promise of a refined smoking experience, according to Brian and Chris.

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: This episode explores Quality Importers, a comprehensive provider of cigar accessories, showcasing their diverse product lines, in-house customization services, and new "Conspiracy" cigar brand, all built on a foundation of strategic acquisitions and a passion for the cigar lifestyle.

programme.title: Behind the Blend
programme.desc: In this "Behind the Blend" episode, Belkys Sanchez, Regional Sales Manager for Crown Heads, shares her journey in the male-dominated cigar industry, covering her territory of Florida, Georgia, and Puerto Rico. She details the history and offerings of Crown Heads and Ozgener Family Cigars, emphasizing their quality and accessible price points, and highlights the Puerto Rican market's preference for larger ring gauges. [cite_start]Sanchez concludes by reflecting on what cigars mean to her: "life, journey, history, culture, and peace," and encourages aspiring sales managers to follow their passions.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, host Bryan Baiss is joined by cigar expert Maxwell De Jong to review the renowned Romeo y Julieta cigar. Together, they dive into its flavor, burn, and craftsmanship, sharing their thoughts on how this classic stick holds up in today's market.

programme.title: Cigar TV Original Documentaries
programme.desc: Tampa Cigar Week 2025 offers an immersive experience for cigar enthusiasts, featuring VIP tastings and pairings with premium cigars and spirits, along with various events aimed at celebrating and educating attendees on Tampa's rich cigar culture.

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: In this episode of Unrolled, host Bryan Baiss visits the renowned Casa Perfecto lounge. Join Bryan as he takes you on a tour of this iconic lounge, exploring its atmosphere, cigar selection, and what makes it a must-visit spot for cigar lovers.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: Brian and Chris, your trusted tobacco experts, tackle the unique Drew Estate Year of the Rat cigar. They'll dissect its distinctive blend, construction, and flavor nuances, offering their seasoned perspectives on this celebrated release. Tune in to see if this Year of the Rat lives up to the hype and earns their stamp of approval.

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: The Cigar Quarters in Haines City, Florida, offers a diverse selection of cigars, including rare and infused options, in a welcoming atmosphere created by owner Dr. Anthony Grant, who shares his personal connection to cigars as a source of focus and calm.

programme.desc: A monster lurks around a high school in the hypnotized town of Willow Hills and picks off tardy students one by one. Now it is up to an unlikely group of teens to put an end to the terror that has plagued many...

programme.title: Lake Terror
programme.desc: Remington has escaped the evil cabin but now the evil continues to follow him, wreaking havoc wherever he goes. Meanwhile, Chloe and Revel look for a missing sister that went to the evil cabin in the previous installment. The two meet Vincent, a failing TV host, to help psychically contact the missing sister. That's when a gunshot rings out in the night and the three meet Remington. Now they all must battle for their lives against the evil that pursues Remington to once and for all lock the evil away for good...

programme.title: Isla de las Muñecas

programme.title: Ana
programme.desc: Dos hombres roban una muñeca de un museo que, sin saberlo, abre una puerta al Infierno...

programme.title: Abrazos No, Balazos
programme.desc: Un hombre es injustamente acusado y encarcelado por 20 años por engaño de su esposa, quien lo acusó falsamente de un crimen. Tras su liberación, el hombre buscará venganza contra su ex esposa y aquellos que lo traicionaron.

programme.title: El Inocente
programme.desc: Un grupo de empresarios se dedican a negocios de bienes y raíces para tapar sus negocios chuecos del narcotráfico. La policía local andan pisándole los talones, pero no tienen pruebas para meterlos a la cárcel. Los enemigos de los empresarios quienes también andan el mismo negocio, entran a sus zonas de ellos para quedarse con todo el territorio. Los empresarios quitan a sus enemigos del camino y para cuando la policía piensa de ya que tienen la pruebas necesarios, se darán cuentan que nos las tienen gracias a uno de sus agentes encubiertos de ellos mismos quien ayuda a los empresarios por que le salvaron la vida.

programme.title: El Ultimo Cartucho
programme.desc: Dos hermanos pistoleros enemigos de las injusticias se reúnen una vez más para salvar una tribu de nativos americanos a los cuales les quieren quitar sus tierras y despojarlos de todas sus pertenencias.

programme.title: El Tercer Deseo
programme.desc: Eugenio, un corredor de bienes raíces despierta en una esquina de la ciudad con una descomunal borrachera y descubre cerca una desportillada tetera de metal. La toma y manosea a ver si es de plata y, de pronto, se le aparece el espectro de un duende que le sugiere formule tres deseos. El genio desaparece sin dar oportunidad al tercer deseo. Mas tarde, descubre que los deseos le han sido concedidos pero de forma equivocada. La vida de Eugenio se complica, solo anhela reencontrar la tetera abandonada y pedir el tercer deseo.

programme.title: Al Acecho del Leopardo AKA Madrid- México
programme.desc: Durante un viaje por la selva mexicana, tres amigos, Román, Patricia y Lorena son testigos de una matanza de campesinos indígenas. Román graba en vídeo la masacre. El Suavecito, el jefe de los asesinos, se da cuenta y mata a Román y a Patricia. Aprovechando la confusión del tiroteo, Lorena logra escapar con la cámara y el vídeo. En su huida se encuentra con un grupo de enanitos toreros que la llevan hasta la ciudad de México. El Suavecito, que no quiere dejar testigos, la persigue implacablemente hasta una enorme plaza de toros, donde en una danza de la muerte, se escenificará la batalla entre el bien y el mal.

programme.title: ¡Ni Te Me Acerques!
programme.desc: Él solo tenía que cuidar el hotel y teclear su novela, como Jack Nicholson en “El Resplandor”, pero de buen rollo. Y Llega la cuarentena y se queda le pilla en el Hotel Balneario de Ariño haciendo frente a la paranoia general, el acoso de las fuerzas del orden, las videollamadas de su novia, su madre y del conspiranoico Javi... Todos nos aburrimos mucho en el primer confinamiento. Juan no.

programme.title: El Sonido de los Tulipanes
programme.desc: En Buenos Aires durante la crisis del 2001, Marcelo un escritor devenido en periodista, debe volver sobre los últimos pasos de su padre Tonio un consagrado intelectual de quien se encuentra profundamente distanciado cuando muere en condiciones extrañas. De la mano de Carolina la ex secretaria de su padre, Marcelo se sumerge en un mundo oscuro lleno de violencia y ambiciones de poder enfrentándose a “El Loco” Bertolini. Pero el peligro no solo lo acechará a él sino también a los suyos. ¿Podrá Marcelo encontrar los verdaderos motivos de la muerte de su padre?

programme.title: El Retorno
programme.desc: Una extraña mujer mantiene expectante y desorientado al espectador cuando a diario habla con su hija y la presencia de su hija no aparece en ningún momento. Una historia no previsible que juega al despiste, por lo que, hay que esperar hasta el final para saber lo que está pasando la protagonista.

programme.title: 48 Horas de Terror
programme.desc: Mateo un escritor citadino adquiere una casa de campo en donde planea vivir con su esposa y escribir en la tranquilidad del campo, pero no tomo en cuenta las trágicas noticias de los acontecimientos de canibalismo que ocurrieron a manos de sus vecinos quienes solo buscan sacias su hambre. Mateo y su esposa corren por sus vidas entre las desoladas montañas buscando sobrevivir al ataque de estos caníbales al final sobrevivirá el más fuerte

programme.title: The Juniors y La Formula Imperial
programme.desc: Narra las vidas de 7 adolescentes millonarios que se aventuran a planificar una revolución social, generada por vídeo-escándalos y experimentos médicos, con el objetivo de generar un cambio en la ideología mundial, el conflicto entre las clases sociales y el enfrentamiento con sus muchachas de servicio doméstico.

programme.title: The God Of After
programme.desc: It’s time to get ready. In “The God Of After,” Pastor Steven Furtick reveals that the attack you’re facing is proof of the purpose on your life.

programme.title: The God Of A Way
programme.desc: Don’t get stuck in this season. In “The God of A Way,” Pastor Steven Furtick reminds us that with God, there’s always a way through whatever you’re facing.

programme.title: The God Of Answers
programme.desc: In “The God Of Answers,” Pastor Holly Furtick teaches us how to focus on the instructions God has given us while we wait for the promises He has planned for us next.

programme.title: The Gift Of Grief
programme.desc: Some of us have believed the lie that “sad is bad,” and we’ve only brought our positivity to God. But when we bring our disappointment to Him, we learn that difficult seasons can become the cornerstone of our faith. Lisa Harper encourages us that our compassionate God is near in “The Gift Of Grief.”

programme.title: God’s Got The Hard Part!
programme.desc: Just like a seed, you’re not buried, you’re planted. When you feel like you’re facing trials in the dark, remember God’s developing you to help you fulfill your purpose.
